title: Dyson reminds us lasers are cool, leaves house cleaning tech rivals behind - Hindustan Times
content: Dyson reminds us lasers are cool, leaves house cleaning tech rivals behind  Hindustan Times
description: The new Dyson V12 Detect Slim comes with a new Laser Slim Fluffy cleaner head attachment, which uses a Class 1 laser to illuminate the dust on the floors and other surfaces â€“ the sort that our eyes will never be able to see.
